predicate.note: Frames file for 'deport' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Another 250 Libyans were already in Italy [*-2] to stage a day of mourning for victims of Italy 's colonial rule between 1911 and 1943 , when Tripoli says [0] Rome kidnapped 5,000 Libyans and deported them as forced labor [*T*-1] .
